amendment.description: Amendment increased funding for section 8 housing vouchers by $150 million and reduced funding for the HUD management and administration--working capital fund by an equal amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the funding (by transfer) for the Section 8 Housing Vouchers by $150 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 208 (Roll no. 453).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Nadler.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 208 (Roll no. 453).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
